name: Animated Cupid 8bit
description:
You are the master of hearts. You like to see people that love each other. And you will stop at nothing to make them all fall in love.

Take your bow and love arrows and shoot them up. Make people kiss, and fall in love with each other.

There is nothing that can stop you... Except for the snakes, falling rocks, and some violent birds.

Other than that, you can flap you angel wings up and down until you have spread love all over the world.

Do not wait anymore, go ahead and download the game right now, and enjoy collecting hearts, stars, and love arrows.

LOVE is in the air!

And you are the most talented cupid of them all!!!

Enjoy, and share with your friends.
